item.title: Need Help With Dragon Dagger
item.dc:creator: @emmetterio emmetterio
item.description:
@emmetterio wrote:

HOW I CAN CHANGE IT TO HIT 4 TIMES WITH SPECIAL ATTACK PLZ HELP ANYONE

} else if (p.equipment[3] == 5698 && p.specialAmount >= 25) { // Dragon dagger(s).
p.usingSpecial = false;
p.specialAmount -= 25;
p.requestAnim(1062, 0);
p.requestGFX(180, 100);
p2.appendHit(Misc.random(42), 0);
p.usingSpecial = false;
